00042 #ifndef _WDT_DRV_H_
00043 #define _WDT_DRV_H_
00044 
00045 //_____ I N C L U D E S ____________________________________________________
00046 
00047 #ifdef __GNUC__
00048    #include <avr/io.h>
00049    #include <avr/wdt.h>
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 
00053 //_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________
00054 
00057 
00058 #define Is_ext_reset()  ((MCUSR&(1<<EXTRF)) ? TRUE:FALSE)
00059 #define Ack_ext_reset() (MCUSR= ~(1<<EXTRF))
00060 #define Is_POR_reset()  ((MCUSR&(1<<(MCUSR= ~(1<<PORF)))) ? TRUE:FALSE)
00061 #define Ack_POR_reset() (MCUSR= ~(1<<PORF))
00062 #define Is_BOD_reset()  ((MCUSR&(1<<BORF)) ? TRUE:FALSE)
00063 #define Ack_BOD_reset() (MCUSR= ~(1<<BORF))
00064 #define Is_wdt_reset()  ((MCUSR&(1<<WDRF)) ? TRUE:FALSE)
00065 #define Ack_wdt_reset() (MCUSR= ~(1<<WDRF))
00066 
00067 //For compatibility with Tinyx61 code
00068 #define WDTCR WDTCSR
00069 
00070 #ifdef __GNUC__
00071 //#define Wdt_reset_instruction()   (asm("WDR"))
00072 #define Wdt_reset_instruction()  (wdt_reset())
00073 #else
00074 #define Wdt_reset_instruction()  (__watchdog_reset())
00075 #endif
00076 #define Wdt_clear_flag()         (Ack_wdt_reset())
00077 #define Wdt_change_enable()      (WDTCSR |= (1<<WDCE) )
00078 #define Wdt_enable_16ms()        (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE))
00079 #define Wdt_enable_32ms()        (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP0) )
00080 #define Wdt_enable_64ms()        (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP1) )
00081 #define Wdt_enable_125ms()       (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP1) | (1<<WDP0))
00082 #define Wdt_enable_250ms()       (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP2) )
00083 #define Wdt_enable_500ms()       (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP2) | (1<<WDP0))
00084 #define Wdt_enable_1s()          (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP2) | (1<<WDP1))
00085 #define Wdt_enable_2s()          (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP2) | (1<<WDP1) | (1<<WDP0))
00086 #define Wdt_enable_4s()          (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP3) )
00087 #define Wdt_enable_8s()          (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP3) | (1<<WDP0))
00088 
00089 #define Wdt_interrupt_16ms()     (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE))
00090 #define Wdt_interrupt_32ms()     (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE) | (1<<WDP0) )
00091 #define Wdt_interrupt_64ms()     (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE) | (1<<WDP1) )
00092 #define Wdt_interrupt_125ms()    (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE) | (1<<WDP1) | (1<<WDP0))
00093 #define Wdt_interrupt_250ms()    (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE) | (1<<WDP2) )
00094 #define Wdt_interrupt_500ms()    (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE) | (1<<WDP2) | (1<<WDP0))
00095 #define Wdt_interrupt_1s()       (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE) | (1<<WDP2) | (1<<WDP1))
00096 #define Wdt_interrupt_2s()       (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE) | (1<<WDP2) | (1<<WDP1) | (1<<WDP0))
00097 #define Wdt_interrupt_4s()       (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE) | (1<<WDP3) )
00098 #define Wdt_interrupt_8s()       (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDIE) | (1<<WDP3) | (1<<WDP0))
00099 
00100 #define Wdt_enable_reserved5()   (WDTCSR =  (1<<WDE) | (1<<WDP3) | (1<<WDP2) | (1<<WDP1) | (1<<WDP0))
00101 #define Wdt_stop()               (WDTCSR = 0x00)
00102 
00103 #define Wdt_ack_interrupt()      (WDTCSR = (U8)(1<<WDIF))
00104 #define Is_wdt_interrupt()         (WDTCSR&(1<<WDIF) ? TRUE:FALSE)
00105 #define Is_not_wdt_interrupt()         (WDTCSR&(1<<WDIF) ? FALSE:TRUE)

00121 #define Wdt_off()                (Wdt_reset_instruction(),  \
00122                                   Wdt_clear_flag(),         \
00123                                   Wdt_change_enable(),      \
00124                                   Wdt_stop())
